Rattrap:



"Hey, hey!" he called after Squizzy. "Wait up!" He gained up on her, 
running as fast as his legs would carry him. She was new, so that 
meant that she was in a sense harmless. He had to talk to her. He 
hadn't talked to someone in a long while. All he had done was run. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Squizzy:;
> 
> She looked over her shoulder and saw the rat coming after her and 
> yelling at her. She turned and kept running. She noticed how the 
rat 
> looked simalar to her in form, but different.  She yelled at 
him "Get 
> away!"  She turned and ran.   She was still unknowingly  headed 
> towards the allience ship.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Rattrap: 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Seeing Squizzy run off, he did the same. He fired at the bots in 
> the 
> > clearing as he took off. He followed Squizzy's direction.
> > 
> > "Hey, wait up!" he called after her.
